text: hi my name is Benjamin Hong and I'm the
founder and CEO of ioda MCH we are a
medical technology company headquartered
in Singapore that is focused on using AI
for medical imaging diagnosis for Asia
I'm Ed tan CTO of aota M I lead a
developer team to create AI based
software as a medical device we
specialize in creating state-of-the-art
AI models to enhance clinical workflow
for medical imaging analysis we live in
a world where 2/3 of the planet's
population have insufficient access to
Radiologists making it a challenge to
implement health screening at the
population level at iatch we aim to
collaborate with Healthcare Providers
Radiologists and Medical Specialists to
co-create and launch solutions to solve
Asia's Healthcare challenges to make
early diagnosis more accessible for
healthcare practitioners and patients
and to accelerate the development of our
AI products we developed our AI assisted
annotation platform called iota aiaa
this platform is available to be
deployed in a healthcare cloud and it
can speed up AI product development and
annotation by up to 10 times saving
precious time for our AI developers and
collaborating Radiologists when
co-creating AI products for early
detection of cancer intal Hemorrhage
strokes and more for example a data
curation and annotation project which
was previously estimated to take up to 2
years it can now be completed in a
matter of weeks with our Iota aiaa
platform the on demand Amazon is C2 is
ideal when our AI model requires a high
performance GPU to accelerate our build
and do the heavy lifting it allows us to
right size the compute to serve the
influence model and software to end
users the ability to easily increase the
compute resources on AWS to meet our AI
models training needs is a big plus for
us in addition we can create databases
within minutes using Amazon relational
database service these capabilities will
also enrich with aw s specialist
engagements which cover AWS
infrastructure machine learning
analytics and the healthcare Life
Sciences domain apart from 24x7 cloud
availability AWS allows us to deploy
region-based Cloud products to meet our
customers requirements for in-country
data hosting and to comply with their
Healthcare data residency laws this
makes AWS a strategic Cloud technology
partner as a part of the AWS partner
Network we have been able to expand our
reach Beyond Singapore and scale quickly
to provide our AI products and solutions
to healthcare customers across the
region we also had the opportunity to
join exclusive AWS program such as the
AWS AIML reactor program for asan in
2022 which we emerg Champions out of 300
plus applicants and the AWS data lab
program in 2023 which gave us access to
AWS Specialists who assisted us with
diving deep into enhancing our Solution
by leveraging Cutting Edge Technologies
we are developing multiple AI medical
products to improve patient outcomes in
areas such as prioritization of urgent
medical cases and Medical Imaging health
screening at the population level with
the expected higher demand for computing
power Amazon Autos scaling allows us to
manage flips of servers where multiple
instances could be created the core of
our mission at aoda MCH goes far beyond
developing AI Solutions in healthcare it
is to provide a platform for clinicians
Radiologists and Healthcare Providers to
transform healthcare for the millions of
people living in Southeast Asia and
Beyond using AWS has contributed to our
ability to develop AI solutions for our
customers to adopt ultimately improving
efficiency and saving
lives
